segments.text: I can't help but feel worried seeing this kitchen disaster unfolding.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is overflowing, water everywhere on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is so absorbed in her task, unaware of the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: If she slips on that wet floor, it could be bad.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy on the stool looks precarious, one wrong move and down he goes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's reaching for cookies, but the stool is tilting backward.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is right there, she might get hurt too if it falls.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her little hand is up, expecting a treat without a care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside seems so safe compared to this chaos inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the woman turns around before something terrible happens.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water damage is one thing, but injuries scare me more.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cookies are tempting them into this risk, poor kids.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This could end in tears, I just know it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Why isn't anyone watching them properly?
segments.speaker: PAR
